# Repository structure reorganization for Vobot apps (2025-12-15 02:17Z)

_**User (2025-12-15 02:23Z)**_

i messed up my original file locations and organization and we have committed to github.com already too. I have the folder tree mostly how i want it. i wasn't sure what to do with ntfy/.venv if that needs to pull out one level or it's specific to ntfy subdir app.

The idea is one Vobot folder with all the sub "applications" we make under it. ntfy being the first of many to come...

previously .git .github .specstory and maybe others were in the ntfy folder. i manually moved them one level up where they should be. 

However i don't know how to ensure everything is aligned properly again (this may include the various .md files too that might point to wrong directories and commands now). also the .git directory may be misaligned and complain so that needs you to fix it too.

Then it needs to be pushed properly up to https://github.com/DAE51D/vobot-apps/tree/main when we get it all sorted so everything is in sync.

Does that make sense?

**Options:**


**Option 2: Nuclear (Fresh Start)** - Delete `.git` and reinitialize:
- Keeps no history
